answers.answer: I don't know. I've never gone into labor naturally. Had to be induced 3 times.
Same with my first, thanks for replying though... I'm timing them now.

When I was reading up on signs of labor (I got a packet from my ob) I never saw anything about the hot flashes but it did say that since you know your body best, pay attention to any changes. Also, your getting closer when the contractions get into a pattern. There's an app for timing them!

Thanks, doctor retesting for preeclampsia I won't hear until Monday... But noticing my feet swelling, contraction have been going for weeks, weeks!!!! In patterns they've tried meds to stop them and nothing has worked... The hit flashes are new as of today, read online it's one of many signs as is everything else.

For both pregnancies I've gotten got flashes with my contractions my ears get red and everything lol its definitely not my blood pressure as it's been lower than ever since I've been pregnant just everybody is different I wouldn't worry to much

Last 3 days I'm been having the same thing, contraction starts i get a hot flash. I didn't get that with my other 2. It's not my blood pressure either, always been on the lower end every time they check it.

question: I've had contractions for weeks but today I'm having my own personal heat wave along with contractions.Am I getting closer?
title: Contractions with hot flashes?
